gen:link.msg:message: v22474_m: [C 95.00.a (All rows, All sheets)] if ({{c0010}} > 0 or {{c0020}} > 0) then ({{c0010}} != empty and {{c0020}} != empty and {{c0030}} != empty and {{c0040}} != empty and {{c0060}} != empty and {{c0070}} != empty and {{c0080}} != empty and {{c0110}} != empty and {{c0120}} != empty and {{c0170}} != empty and {{c0180}} != empty and {{c0190}} != empty and {{c0200}} != empty) FAILS because if (({$a} > 0 or {$b} > 0)) then ((not(empty($c) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'c'))) and not(empty($d) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'd'))) and not(empty($e) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'e'))) and not(empty($f) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'f'))) and not(empty($g) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'g'))) and not(empty($h) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'h'))) and not(empty($i) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'i'))) and not(empty($j) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'j'))) and not(empty($k) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'k'))) and not(empty($l) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'l'))) and not(empty($m) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'm'))) and not(empty($n) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'n'))) and not(empty($o) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'o'))))) else (true()) is not true
